conversation.content:
(As far as he knows, David has never been hypnotized before. Actually, his boss at the cafe, Stella, has been hypnotizing him for weeks and making him forget about it afterwards. She’d like for someone else to see how easily she can hypnotize David into performing a special new foot massage service.! The idea turns her on actually)

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

“Hey, David! How are you?” his friend exclaimed.

David turned around, surprised to see her. “Hey! I’m good, thanks. How about you?”

“I’m doing great. Listen, I was in the area and I’ve been dying to try out this new foot massage service that I’ve heard about. Do you know if this cafe offers it?”

David scratched his head, trying to remember if they did. “I’m not sure, to be honest. Let me check with Stella.”

He walked over to Stella, who was sitting at the counter, watching them. “Hey, Stella. Do we offer a foot massage service?”

Stella smiled sweetly. “Actually, David, we do now. And I think it’s the perfect time to test it out.”

David looked confused. “What? Now? But I’ve never done a foot massage before.”

“Oh, don’t worry about that, David. I’ll guide you through it. And since we’re not busy right now, it’s the perfect opportunity. Come on, let’s give it a try.”

Stella led David to a quiet corner of the cafe and sat him down on a chair. She instructed him to take off his shoes and socks, and then she began to lightly massage his feet. As she did this, she began to speak to him in a soft, calming voice, telling him to relax and let go of any tension he may be feeling.

Slowly but surely, David felt himself falling into a state of deep relaxation. His mind became foggy, his eyes grew heavy, and he felt as though he was floating on a cloud.

Stella continued to speak to him, her voice becoming more and more seductive. “David, you are feeling so relaxed. Your mind is blank, and you are open to suggestion. When I snap my fingers, you will wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated, but you will have the sudden urge to give the best foot massage of your life.”

She snapped her fingers, and David suddenly woke up with a jolt. He felt amazing, as if he had just had the best nap of his life, but he couldn’t shake the feeling that he needed to give a foot massage.

“Wow, that was incredible,” David said, yawning. “I feel so relaxed.”

Stella smiled. “I’m glad you enjoyed it. Now, why don’t you give me a foot massage?”

David eagerly obliged, and as he massaged Stella’s feet, he couldn’t believe how good he was at it. He knew he had never given a foot massage before, but it felt like second nature to him.

After a few minutes, Stella pulled away, looking thoroughly satisfied. “David, that was amazing. You have a real talent for this.”

David beamed with pride. “Thanks, Stella. I didn’t know I had it in me.”

Stella chuckled to herself, knowing that it was all due to her hypnotic suggestion. She couldn’t wait to see what other talents she could coax out of David.

conversation.content:
Big Brenda (40) has been hypnotizing a willing younger colleague, Dan, for a few weeks, and he’s an excellent hypnotic subject. He’s getting easier and easier to put into deeper and deeper trance. After every session, Brenda makes Dan forget everything that happened, and the next time she asks if he’d be willing to give hypnosis a try he always thinks it’s the first time.

It’s a stifling day in the office. Brenda interrupts a conversation Dan is having with Lucy, another colleague. "Hey, Dan. Have you ever been hypnotized?" she asks.
Dan and Lucy look at her with puzzlement. "Er, no Brenda," says Dan. "Never. Why do you ask?"

Brenda smiles slyly. "Oh, just curious. It’s such an interesting experience. But I suppose some people are more susceptible to hypnosis than others, right?" she looks at Dan pointedly. 

Dan feels a shiver go down his spine. He’s not sure why, but he suddenly feels very anxious. "Uh, I guess so," he stammers. 

"Well, let’s find out," says Brenda, and before Dan can protest, she begins to swing a shiny silver watch back and forth in front of his eyes. "Just follow the watch with your eyes, Dan. That’s it. You’re doing great." 

Lucy watches in amazement as Dan’s eyes seem to glaze over. He’s completely under Brenda’s spell. "Wow, that’s incredible," she whispers. 

Brenda nods. "Yes, it is. And there’s even more we can do. Just watch." She begins to give Dan a series of suggestions, each one making him more and more obedient to her will. By the time she’s done, he’s like putty in her hands. 

"Okay, Dan. We’re going to stop now and you’ll wake up feeling relaxed and refreshed. You won’t remember any of this, but you’ll feel great. Remember, we never spoke about hypnosis before today," says Brenda firmly. 

Dan blinks and shakes his head. "Whoa, I feel weird," he says. "What just happened?" 

"Nothing, don’t worry about it," says Brenda, smiling. "Just a little experiment." 

Lucy looks at her in disbelief. "That was amazing. How did you do that?" 

Brenda just smiles mysteriously. "Trade secret." 

From that day on, Brenda keeps using Dan as her hypnotic toy whenever she feels like it. He never remembers anything, but he can’t help feeling like something strange is happening to him. He’s not sure how much longer he can keep playing along with Brenda’s game.

BAIL

conversation.content:
Mary is the office manager. She's 45 years old, and wearing open-toed sandals. [STORY CONTAINS FOOT KISSING] Before everyone leaves at the end of the working day, Mary gathers the team around in a circle. She seems to have a strange smile on her face.
"I want to thank you all for working really hard this week," she says, looking round at everyone. "I just wanted to let you all know how much I appreciate your efforts."
"I particularly want to thank Dan for taking part in a little experiment today," she says. Dan looks up, wondering what on earth she's on about.
"Thank you for all your hard work, Dan," she says, looking right at him. "You really deserve to go home and have a good *sleep!*" And she snaps her fingers.
Instantly Dan completely relaxes. His mind goes blank, his eyes close and his face goes slack as he suddenly spirals deep into a hypnotic trance, even more completely under than eariler. He slumps limply, mindlessly, in his seat as Mary explains to his colleagues.
"Dan was put under by a trained hypnotist earlier today and given the suggestion that he'd go back into trance whenever I snap my fingers and tell him to sleep."
Your collagues are amazed, amused, intrigued. Dan is oblivious to all of them, focusing only on Mary's voice.
"He's in an extremely suggestible state, totally hypnotized," she continues. "Now, Dan. On the count of three, you'll wake up and realize that you've been hypnotized in front of your colleagues, and you'll feel very embarrassed. One, two... three. Wakey wakey!"

Dan opens his eyes and realizes with horror that somehow he was hypnotized in front of all his workmates. He is mortified. People are laughing at him. He just wants to get out of there, but before he can move, Mary snaps her fingers again and says simply, "Sleep!" and he cannot resist just dropping right back into a trance.
Dan slumps back into his seat, limp and blank like a rag doll. His mind is empty, and he is powerless to resist Mary's hypnotic command. 
"Ten times deeper, twenty times deeper, a hundred times deeper," says Mary, clearly enjoying the power she's having over Dan in front of everyone. "Now you'll do whatever I say, Dan. Open your eyes, but remain deeply hypnotized."

conversation.content: Do people who have been hypnotized find that everything kind of fades out except the hypnotist's voice and commands? What is that feeling like, exactly, according to reports?

The experience of hypnosis can vary among individuals, and there is no universal or definitive description of how it feels. However, some individuals who have been hypnotized may indeed report a sense of focusing intensely on the hypnotist's voice and instructions, with other stimuli becoming less prominent or fading into the background. Here are a few commonly reported sensations or feelings associated with hypnosis:

1. Heightened Focus: Many people report a heightened sense of concentration or focus during hypnosis. This concentrated focus may lead to a reduced awareness of the surroundings and distractions, making the hypnotist's voice and commands feel more prominent.

2. Deep Relaxation: Hypnosis often induces a deep state of relaxation, both mentally and physically. This relaxation can contribute to a feeling of letting go and surrendering control, making the hypnotist's suggestions feel more compelling.

3. Altered State of Consciousness: Some individuals describe the hypnotic state as an altered state of consciousness, distinct from the regular waking state. They may feel detached or dissociated from their surroundings, similar to daydreaming or being in a trance-like state.

4. Enhanced suggestibility: While under hypnosis, people may experience increased receptivity to suggestions from the hypnotist. This suggestibility can lead to a heightened compliance with the hypnotist's commands and an increased susceptibility to positive changes or behavioral suggestions.

It's important to note that these experiences can differ from person to person, and not everyone will have the same sensations during hypnosis. Additionally, hypnosis is a complex phenomenon, and professionals use various techniques, so individual experiences may vary based on the specific methods used in the session.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him really love being hypnotized by her, and become even easier to hypnotize in future, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do it, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare had slipped off her shoes.

She was feeling good and enjoying the party atmosphere.

“So, David, have you ever been hypnotized before?” she asked him with a mischievous smile on her face.

David looked at her skeptically, “Come on, Clare, hypnosis isn’t real. It’s all just a big scam.”

Clare chuckled, “Well, some people believe it’s real. It’s just a matter of finding the right hypnotist.”

She noticed David’s eyes narrowing as he stared at her, “You’re not going to hypnotize me, are you?”

Clare shrugged innocently, “Not if you don’t want me to.”

She moved closer to him and started to speak in a low, soothing tone of voice. David’s eyes flickered as he felt himself becoming more and more relaxed. He started to feel a strange sensation in his head, like something was slipping away from him.

Clare watched in amazement as David went under her spell. She could see his body becoming limp and relaxed in his chair. She had never hypnotized anyone before, it was just a joke to her, but now she was giddy with excitement.

“David,” she whispered, “you’re feeling very relaxed and sleepy now. You’re going to fall even deeper under my spell. You’ll love being hypnotized by me.”

David nodded slowly in agreement. He was completely under her control.

Clare continued to feed him suggestions for what felt like hours. She made him love being hypnotized, and promised that every time she used her hypnotic powers on him in the future he would go even deeper under her spell, and be even more suggestible and open to her commands.

Finally, she snapped her fingers and David came back to the real world, feeling totally refreshed and happy, as if he had just had the best nap of his life.

“Wow, that was amazing,” he said with a big grin on his face, “I can’t believe I actually went under.”

Clare smiled slyly, “Well, it’s a good thing you enjoyed it, David. That means you’ll be even easier to hypnotize next time.”

But despite her promises, David had no memory of what she’d done to him. He just knew that he was looking forward to the next time they had a joke about hypnosis.

conversation.content:
(Unknown to him, Dan’s boss Justine is able to hypnotize him with ease) The office manager in Dan’s department, Justine, openly preferred the women in the office, which seemed unfair to Dan. One warm, humid afternoon in July, when all the women were wearing sandals in the office, Justine called Dan into her office. When he entered, not only Justine, but also Jacqui, with whom he did not get on well at all, was in there.
Justine took off her glasses. “I suppose you’re wondering what this is about.”

Dan hesitated, feeling uneasy with the fact that Jacqui was in the room. "Yes, Justine, what's going on?"

Justine leaned back in her chair, her eyes locked on Dan's. "Well, it has come to my attention that you've been feeling a bit... left out in the department. Is that correct?"

Dan shifted uncomfortably in his seat. "I wouldn't say left out, but I feel like the atmosphere could be more inclusive."

"Oh, I see," Justine replied, her voice dripping with condescension. As Dan watched her speak, he could have sworn he saw a slight twinkle in her eye, but he shook the thought off as his imagination. "And do you think this is because I prefer working with the women in the department?"

"Well, that's certainly a factor, but overall I think there's just a general lack of team spirit and camaraderie," Dan said, trying to remain diplomatic.

Justine and Jacqui exchanged a brief glance, as if sharing some private joke. "Dan, I understand where you're coming from," Justine said, her voice softening dangerously. "And I'm going to help you feel more at peace with your place in our department. Just listen to my voice."

Dan's instincts screamed at him to get up and leave the room, but before he knew it, he was unable to tear his gaze away from Justine's intense stare. His body felt heavy, and his mind foggy. It was as if a thick, syrupy haze had descended over his brain, making it impossible to think clearly or even retain a thought for more than a few seconds.

"Justine, what's... what's happening?" Dan managed, his voice sounding weak and distant, as if it belonged to someone else.

She leaned in closer, her eyes never leaving his. "You're feeling sleepy, Dan. So very sleepy. And the more you fight it, the deeper into this trance you'll go. That's it, let go. Embrace it."

Dan wanted to argue, to fight back, but the weight of Justine's will crushed his resistance. As a new wave of drowsiness washed over him, Jacqui's mocking laughter in the background faded away, replaced by a blissful emptiness that robbed him of his strength, his will, and his identity.

In that moment, Dan knew only one thing – he was powerless to resist Justine, and he would do whatever she wanted. After all, her eyes were so captivating, and her voice so soothing. It was so much easier to just listen and obey.

And so, Dan's office life became something out of a nightmare – a mental prison where Justine held the keys. But with each day that passed, he found himself more and more willing to accept his new reality, to bow to the whims of the woman who controlled him so completely.

He wasn't even aware that he was doing it – but deep down, a part of him enjoyed the strange new dynamic, the release from responsibility, the exhilaration of complete submission.

And as the months wore on, the women in the office couldn't help but notice the change in Dan – the way he bent over backwards to accommodate their needs, the adoration in his eyes as he looked at Justine. They knew he was different now, and some part of them relished the thought that they, too, had a hand in his transformation. It was their little secret, the unspoken bond that united them all in ways they could never have imagined.

BAIL

On a typical summer day in the office, the sun streamed through the tall windows, casting a warm, golden glow throughout the room. The hum of the air conditioning system filled the air with a comforting white noise, combating the humid air outside. The faint scent of a floral air freshener drifted throughout the office, adding an extra touch of brightness to the atmosphere.

Dan arrived at work right on time, carrying a box of donuts for his co-workers with a bright, eager smile. Greeted by the familiar faces of his female colleagues, he set the box down on the break room table, proud to be of service in any way he could.

As everyone sat down at their desks, the office buzzed with activity. Phones rang with customer inquiries, keyboards clacked as reports were typed up, and printers whirred with the sound of emails being printed out for review. The vibe was productive yet relaxed, as everyone blended into the rhythm of the workday.

During lunch, Dan often found himself assisting his colleagues with various tasks – getting drinks for them from the vending machine, helping to set up an impromptu meeting space or topping up printer papers. He reveled in this newfound appreciation for the seemingly mundane aspects of office life, knowing deep down that his actions brought him closer to Justine.

Justine, of course, continued to hold sway over Dan with her uncanny ability to hypnotize him. The more Dan helped his colleagues, the more favorably they looked upon Justine's leadership. The days blended seamlessly into one another, leaving Dan in a state of content servitude.

Among these female colleagues, conversations were professional yet punctuated with light-hearted banter. Justine’s hypnotic power over Dan had become a common knowledge among all the women in the office, but it was discussed with a wink and a nod, another shared secret that fostered a sense of sisterhood among them.

As the day drew to a close, Dan found himself tidying up the office space, organizing supplies, and checking in with his colleagues one final time before everyone packed up to leave. There was a sense of satisfaction in the way he carried himself, knowing that he had been of use to the women in his department.

The sun dipped lower in the sky as Dan locked up the office for the night, stepping out into the warm evening air. He felt a sense of purpose and happiness as he made his way home, having a deep admiration for Justine and the unity of the office.

Though his life had changed beyond recognition since that fateful summer day in Justine's office, Dan found solace in the acceptance of his role in this new world – a place where his desires and ambitions were molded by the hypnotic gaze of a woman he could never defy.

conversation.content:
A coffee shop managed by a charismatic woman called Laura. Indie kid Dan’s been working there for a couple of weeks, but hasn’t endeared himself to Laura. A hot summer day. Fiona, Dan’s sister-in-law (they really don’t get on) comes in to the cafe. They talk frostily. Laura comes over to introduce herself and they chat.
Laura will take a liking to Fiona and gradually bring the conversation round to hypnosis, specifically hypnotizing Dan (who's understandably reluctant). Laura will use a classic rapid induction, Dan will drop under surprisingly easily. Once Dan’s hypnotized, Laura will implant a trigger-word for Fiona to use on Dan. Laura will then wake him up, and encourage Fiona to drop him straight back under using the trigger word! Fiona will gleefully command Dan to give her a foot massage, like a slave. In a deep mindless trance, Dan’s only desire is to obey, helplessly kneading Fiona’s feet.

As the hot summer day drags on, Fiona reluctantly enters the coffee shop where her brother-in-law, Dan, works. She glances around, hoping to avoid any unnecessary interaction with him. Unfortunately, fate has other plans, as Laura, the charismatic coffee shop manager, approaches Fiona and introduces herself.

"Hi there! I'm Laura. I don't believe we've met before," Laura says with a warm smile, extending her hand towards Fiona.

Fiona hesitates for a moment before hesitantly shaking Laura's hand. "Yes, I'm Fiona. Nice to meet you," she replies, her tone slightly guarded.

As the conversation progresses, Laura senses the tension between Fiona and Dan and decides to break the ice. "So, Fiona, how do you know Dan? He's been working here for a couple of weeks now, and he's quite the character," Laura says with a chuckle.

Fiona rolls her eyes but can't help but soften a little at Laura's friendly manner. "He's my brother-in-law. We have our differences, but I try to tolerate him," she replies, trying to hide a hint of amusement.

Laura raises an eyebrow playfully. "Oh, I see. Well, sometimes family can be challenging. But you know what? I've recently been studying hypnosis, and I've found it to be quite fascinating. Have you ever heard of it?"

Fiona's interest is piqued as she leans in a little closer. "Hypnosis? Really? That sounds intriguing. I've only seen it in movies or stage shows. Is it actually effective?"

Laura nods enthusiastically. "Absolutely! It can be incredibly powerful if used correctly. In fact, with the right techniques, one can enter a deeply relaxed state and become highly suggestible. It's pretty amazing, to be honest."

Dan, who has been silently listening from behind the counter, raises an eyebrow skeptically. "Hypnosis? That stuff is all a load of nonsense," he interjects, crossing his arms.

Laura grins mischievously, sensing the perfect opportunity to prove Dan wrong while also building a bond with Fiona. "Well, Dan, why don't we put your skepticism to the test? I'm confident that I can hypnotize you quickly and easily."

Dan scoffs but agrees nonetheless, thinking it will be impossible to hypnotize him. Laura guides him to a comfortable chair, and with a few soothing words, she begins the classic rapid induction process. Surprisingly, Dan's eyes flutter and he falls into a trance-like state.

Laura's eyes sparkle with satisfaction as she turns to Fiona and whispers, "Watch this. I've just implanted a trigger word in his mind. When you say it, he'll go right back under hypnosis, completely under your command. Go ahead, try it!"

Curiosity mixed with a twinge of wicked delight, Fiona says the trigger word Laura had shared with her. Instantly, Dan's eyes glaze over, and he becomes completely obedient to Fiona's commands.

"Dan, I think it's time you showed some appreciation for all the times I've put up with you," Fiona says, a sly grin spreading across her face. "Give me a foot massage, right now, like a slave."

In his deep, mindless trance, Dan's only impulse is to obey blindly. He moves to Fiona's feet and begins gently kneading them, completely helpless to resist her command.

As Fiona revels in her newfound power, Laura watches with amusement, enjoying the unexpected turn of events. A hot summer day never seemed so captivating, filled with the hypnotic sway of obedience and a foot massage like no other.

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

Her name was Alyssa, and she used to work at the cafe with David before she got a new job. David greeted her with a big smile and a hug, then walked her over to Stella who was sitting at one of the tables.

"Stella, this is my friend Alyssa. Alyssa, this is my boss, Stella." David introduced them, and they exchanged pleasantries.

Stella, seeing this as the perfect opportunity to show off her control over David, decided to go for it. She secretly gave David a command with a trigger phrase she had previously implanted in his mind during one of their hypnosis sessions.

"David, didn't you say you had to clean the floors?" Stella asked innocently.

With those words, David's demeanor changed completely. His eyes seemed to glaze over slightly, and he nodded obediently.

"Yes, I have to clean the floors," he agreed, immediately kneeling on the ground in front of Stella.

Alyssa looked confused and amused at the same time, asking, "Do you guys always clean the floors like this?"

Stella smirked and decided to push it further, "David, don't you think my feet look tired? Why don't you give them a little massage while you're down there?"

David didn't hesitate for even a second. He reached for Stella's feet and began massaging them as if it were the most normal thing in the world.

"What the hell is going on, David?!" Alyssa exclaimed in surprise, not understanding his strange behavior.

Stella, unable to contain her delight, confessed with a smug grin, "I've hypnotized David, and he's been my obedient little worker for weeks now. Isn't it amazing?"

Alyssa stared at her, shocked and unsure if she should be horrified or impressed. "And he doesn't remember any of it?"

"Nope," Stella confirmed, enjoying the attention and control. "Every time I bring him out of hypnosis, I make him forget what happened. He has no idea."

As David continued massaging Stella's feet, Alyssa couldn't help but feel a mix of unease and fascination, watching her friend unknowingly perform such a submissive act.

"Well then, let's get started, shall we?" Emma leads David into the living room and hands him a vacuum. "I need you to vacuum every inch of this room, David. And I want you to do it while I sit here and watch you. Is that okay?"

David hesitates for a moment, feeling a bit uncomfortable with the idea of being watched, but then he remembers Catherine's hypnosis sessions and how much he trusts her. "Sure, that's fine, Emma."

As David starts vacuuming, Emma sits on the couch, propping her feet up on the coffee table and watching him intently. She crosses and uncrosses her legs, her eyes never leaving David's back as he bends over to reach the hard-to-reach areas beneath the furniture.

After a few minutes, Emma speaks up. "David, I want you to take off your shirt. It's getting warm in here, and I don't want you to get too sweaty."

David looks back at her, surprised. He's never done anything like this before. But something in her eyes makes him feel like he should obey. "Okay," he says softly, unbuttoning his shirt and slipping it off.

conversation.content:
(David’s cousin Kelly embarrassingly easily hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him even easier to hypnotize in future, and to do a few things as her submissive zombie, but she leaves him with no memory of the whole thing. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do an exaggerated fake induction, laughingly playing along at first but gradually becoming docile and utterly entranced, to her astonishment and glee)

David and Kelly are hanging out in the garden of his uncle’s house, David having come over for a Sunday visit. It’s a warm day, David’s drinking a beer and Kelly has taken her socks off and is lying back on a blanket.

Kelly looks over at David and notices how relaxed he looks. She decides to play a little game, pretending to hypnotize him for fun.

“David, look into my eyes,” she says, giggling.

David rolls his eyes but decides to play along. He stares into her eyes as she starts speaking in a low, calm voice.

“Imagine a staircase in your mind,” Kelly says. “With each step you take, you feel more and more relaxed.”

David listens to her words and actually starts to feel more relaxed. He closes his eyes and takes deep breaths.

“Now, imagine yourself at the bottom of the staircase. Ten steps up is a state of deep relaxation,” she continues.

David slowly starts to ascend the staircase in his mind as Kelly’s voice becomes quiet and soothing. He feels his muscles relaxing and his breathing slowing down.

“Nine… Eight… Seven…”

As she counts down the steps, David feels himself becoming more and more calm, until finally he’s at the top. He’s in a state of deep relaxation, and he can hardly move.

Kelly is surprised to see that he’s actually gone under, and she starts to feel a little nervous. She had no idea this was actually going to work.

“David, can you hear me?” she asks.

David nods slowly. His mind is blank and he can hardly think. He feels so calm and relaxed.

“Good. Now, listen carefully,” she tells him. “Every time I snap my fingers, you will go deeper into hypnosis. And the deeper you go, the more suggestions I can give you.”

David nods again, feeling like a puppet whose strings are being pulled by Kelly.

“From now on, you’re going to be my submissive zombie,” Kelly whispers. “You’ll do anything I tell you to do.”

David’s eyes widen but he feels powerless to resist her commands. He knows he should be scared, but instead he feels weirdly excited and submissive.

“And lastly, when you wake up, you won’t remember any of this,” Kelly adds, snapping her fingers.

David snaps out of his trance, feeling a little disoriented but otherwise okay. He has no idea what just happened. In fact, he doesn’t even know that for the rest of his life, he’s going to be easier to hypnotize than he was before.

conversation.content:
David works at Stella’s cafe. Stella has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t know he’s ever been hypnotized at all, but actually Stella can now put him back into trance whenever she wants with a few well-chosen words. 
One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Stella thinks it might amuse Victoria to see her friend become utterly suggestible, and she comes over to join their conversation.
“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods, happy to see his friend. 
“Great,” Stella says smoothly, “David, do me a favor and go refill the ice bucket for me, will you?”
“Sure thing,” David says, getting up from his seat without a second thought.
Victoria watches with amusement as David walks over to the ice machine and begins to fill the bucket. Suddenly, Stella turns to her with a sly smile. “Watch this,” she whispers, and begins to whisper a few words in David’s ear.
Victoria watches in awe as David freezes in place, his eyes growing glassy. “David,” Stella says, “when I snap my fingers, you will become my puppet, obeying my every command without question. Do you understand?”
David nods obediently.
“Good boy,” Stella says, snapping her fingers. David’s body immediately relaxes, and he stands up straight with a vacant look on his face. Victoria can hardly believe what she’s seeing.
“David,” Stella says, “I want you to dance for us. A fun, silly dance that will make us all laugh. Go ahead and start.”
Without hesitation, David begins to dance wildly, making strange movements with his arms and legs and pulling silly faces. Victoria can’t help but giggle at the display.
After a few moments, Stella snaps her fingers again. “David, stop,” she commands. David freezes in place once again. “When I snap my fingers this time, you will wake up with no memory of what just happened. You will feel happy and relaxed, and you will continue with your day as normal. But you will not remember any of this. Do you understand?”
David nods again, utterly obedient to Stella’s words.
“Good boy,” Stella says one final time, snapping her fingers. David blinks a few times and looks around, as if unsure how he got there. “Oh, hey guys,” he says, as if nothing had happened. 
Victoria looks at Stella in amazement. “How did you do that?”
Stella just grins. “Magic,” she says with a wink.

David’s eyes glaze over as Sandra continues to speak to him. Jenny watches in amazement as David follows Sandra’s every command, even doing silly dances and singing songs on the spot.

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

“Victoria! How are you?”

David exclaimed, giving her a warm hug.

“I’m good, how about you?” Victoria replied, taking a seat at the bar.

“I’m doing alright,” David said, flashing her a smile. “What can I get for you?”

“I’ll have a latte, please.”

As David handed Victoria her latte, Stella made her way to the front and greeted Victoria.

“Nice to meet you too,” Victoria replied, shaking her hand.

David chuckled at this, not realizing the weight of Stella’s words.

“I bet he’s a quick learner,” Victoria added.

“Actually, he’s a little slow sometimes,” Stella replied, still grinning. “But that’s okay, because he’s such a good listener.”

David looked at her quizzically, but didn’t say anything.

“Isn’t that right, David?” Stella said, her tone changing slightly.

David felt an odd sensation in the pit of his stomach, but he couldn’t quite put his finger on why.

“Uh, yeah,” he answered hesitantly.

“Good boy,” Stella said, her voice becoming a little softer.

David felt a wave of relaxation wash over him, his eyes briefly closing.

Victoria watched the exchange curiously, but couldn’t quite figure out what was happening.

Stella snapped her fingers and David blinked, returning to his senses.

“Okay, well, I better get back to work,” David said, suddenly feeling energized.

Stella looked at him, still grinning.

“You do that, David,” she said. “You’re doing a great job.”

As she walked away, Victoria turned to David, a puzzled expression on her face.

“Is everything okay?” she asked.

David glanced at her, a small smile on his face.

“Yeah, everything’s fine,” he replied. “Just a little tired, I guess.”

Victoria nodded, but couldn’t shake the feeling that something weird had just happened.
